snippet: More must be done to improve the collection process for student loans.
abstract: Editorial approves of Education Dept's new rules governing student loan servicers but say they do not go far enough to overhaul service system; outlines ways department can improve competition and transparency in the industry.
lead_paragraph: More must be done to improve the collection process for student loans.

headline.main: A Fairer Shot for Student Debtors
headline.print_headline: A Fairer Shot for Student Debtors
